title: $700 Apple Wheels, X-Ray Phone Cameras, & LG's Swiveling Phone?
description:
After a tech-leak-filled interview on our last episode, there is a ton of recent tech news we have to catch up on! Today, we engage rapid-fire-mode with story after story covering everything from new Windows laptops to LG's new dual-screen swiveling phone, with a bit of OnePlus's x-ray-photo phone insanity sprinkled in for good measure. Let's do this!

Links:

https://twitter.com/andymanganelli
